overview: When "Maha" gave birth to "Samir's" first child, she strand further away from "Samir" who is known to be a playboy. Which angers him. Samir meets well-known actress "Sharifa Hamdi", who tries to convince him to divorce "Maha" and marry her.

production_companies.name: Masr for Studios and Film Production

title: Marriage Is for the Braves
